mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PHARMACY_TBL ORDER BY HPID

SELECT * FROM PHARMACY_TBL WHERE 1=1
AND ITEM_NAME LIKE '%' || #{itemName} || '%'
AND ENTP_NAME LIKE '%' || #{entpName} || '%'
ORDER BY ITEM_SEQ

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PHARMACY_TBL WHERE 1=1
AND ITEM_NAME LIKE '%' || #{itemName} || '%'
AND ENTP_NAME LIKE '%' || #{entpName} || '%'
SELECT ITEM_SEQ as itemSeq, ITEM_NAME as itemName FROM PHARMACY_TBL WHERE ITEM_NAME LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' AND ROWNUM <= 10 ORDER BY ITEM_NAME
SELECT DISTINCT ENTP_NAME as entpName FROM PHARMACY_TBL WHERE ENTP_NAME LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' AND ROWNUM <= 10 ORDER BY ENTP_NAME
